metadata.meeting_notes: Create a class diagram for an e-commerce system with classes: User, Product, Order, OrderItem, Payment
metadata.html_content:
🎨 Mermaid Diagram Visualization

📊 Interactive Diagram

This diagram is rendered using Mermaid.js and is fully interactive. You can zoom, pan, and interact with the elements.

classDiagram class User { +name: string +email: string +password: string } class Product { +name: string +description: string +price: number } class Order { +date: date +user_id: int +total_amount: number } class OrderItem { +order_id: int +product_id: int +quantity: int +price: number } class Payment { +order_id: int +payment_method: string +amount: number } User *-- Order : orders Product *-- OrderItem : order_items Order *-- Payment : payments

🔧 Technical Details

Diagram ID: class_diagram

Generated: 2026-01-22 10:59:15

Mermaid Version: 10.6.1

Generated by Architect.AI - Mermaid HTML Renderer

--- Snippet 12 (score: 0.187, file: C:\Users\AGEORGE2\Desktop\Dawn-final-project\cmq\backend\api\versions.py) ---

    @router.get("/{artifact_id}/current", response_model=Dict[str, Any])
    async def get_current_version(
        artifact_id: str,
        current_user: UserPublic = Depends(get_current_user)
    ):
        """Get the current version of an artifact."""
        service = get_version_service()
        version = service.get_current_version(artifact_id)
        if not version:
            raise HTTPException(
                status_code=status.HTTP_404_NOT_FOUND,
                detail=f"No versions found for artifact {artifact_id}"
            )
        return version
